lines.text: A woman needs a man. You are a man, aren't you?
Do you mean to stand there and tell me I ain't got class? Why, in Duluth, I was billed as the... You tell 'em, Mike.
The Classy Chassis from Tallahassee. 'Cept she's from Brooklyn, but that don't rhyme with nothin'.
You think I'll make good on Broadstreet?
